EmailTemplate.subject: NACS 2022: Join NCR to see where convenience fuel retail is headed
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A lot has happened since we last met at NACS. The convenience sector has seen turbulent times: Visits to convenience stores have changed significantly, and customers are looking for flexible ways to shop. Modernizing your store technology is crucial to give your customers the experience they demand. Want to find out what technology trends you can expect to see play out over the next couple of years? Join NCR at NACS in Booth #5919 <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/nacs-2022?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_October_NACS_Retail&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=]]>, in the Technology area, to learn more about: - Virtualizing your existing applications with NCR Software Defined Store to accelerate your path to a Next Gen Store architecture - What Self-Checkout and RPOS can do in the Convenience Store sector to improve use of staff - How you can leverage the latest NCR innovations in Food Service and Mobile technologies to drive growth - Improving your efficiency with real-time insights from our Cloud Based Analytics Platform Book a meeting with one of our experts now! <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/nacs-2022?utm_source=Email&utm_medium=Other&utm_campaign=2022_October_NACS_Retail&utm_content=Email1&utm_industry=retail&utm_sub-industry=]]> We’re looking forward to meeting you in Las Vegas! <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
